DOC.brief_summary: To study safety efficacy Hand Held Nitrous . A device delivers 120 second 72 % nitrous oxide ambient air .
DOC.brief_title: Hand Held Nitrous Oxide Delivery Device
DOC.detailed_description: This study assess Hand Held Nitrous Oxide Deliver Device intend use nitrous oxide sedation system deliver limited 16 gram nitrous oxide total 120 second inhalation time . The device create short term minimal sedation deliver maximum 72 % USP grade nitrous oxide / 28 % ambient air combination quickly drop 33 % nitrous oxide / 67 % ambient air 60 second stay steady gas expel .
DOC.criteria: Any patient undergoing painful office procedure exam Women Pregnant Children three year age
